member.name: ID2D1DrawingStateBlock1.GetDescription
member.summary: Gets the antialiasing mode, transform, tags, primitive blend, and unit mode portion of the drawing state.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the antialiasing mode, transform, tags, primitive blend, and unit mode portion of the drawing state. You must allocate storage for this parameter.

member.name: ID2D1DrawingStateBlock1.SetDescription
member.summary: Sets the associated with this drawing state block.
member.param: The to be set associated with this drawing state block.

summary.para:
Implementation of a drawing state block that adds the functionality of primitive blend in addition to already existing antialias mode, transform, tags and text rendering mode.
Note You can get an ID2D1DrawingStateBlock1 using the method or you can use the QueryInterface method on an object.
